title: Little Bear’s House: Holistic Indoor Playground
blurb: Unique indoor playground in Serangoon Gardens.
description: Little Bear’s House is a 2500 sq ft indoor playground in Serangoon Gardens, offering designated play zones for developmental, interactive, social, imaginative, and cognitive play. Kids can explore toys that encourage development through exploration, discovery, social interaction, and imagination. The venue includes a transportation-themed play zone, a dollhouse for mimicking real-life scenarios, and a supermarket cum kitchen-themed play zone for role play. There's also a cognitive play area with books and puzzles, and an entertaining play area for burning off energy. A feeding area with tables and high chairs is available. Socks are required; anti-slip socks can be purchased. It's an ideal place for quality bonding time in a cozy setting.
keyword_tag: indoor playground, kids activities, play zones, Serangoon Gardens, family bonding
address_display: 21 Lichfield Road, Serangoon Garden Way, Singapore 556841
